verses.text: \w Furthermore|strong="G3063"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* we \w beseech|strong="G2065"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \add you\add* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, that \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye have \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add  \+w so|strong="G2443"\+w*\add* ye would \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* more and \w more|strong="G3123"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w commandments|strong="G3852"\w* we \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add even\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w*, \w that|strong="G0567"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* should \w abstain|strong="G0567"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*:

\w That|strong="G1492"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* should know \w how|strong="G1492"\w* to \w possess|strong="G2932"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lust|strong="G3806"\w* of \w concupiscence|strong="G1939"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \add man\add* go \w beyond|strong="G5233"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w defraud|strong="G4122"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add any\add* \w matter|strong="G4229"\w*: because \w that|strong="G1360"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* the \w avenger|strong="G1558"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w such|strong="G5130"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w we|strong="G4277"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* have \w forewarned|strong="G4277"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testified|strong="G1263"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G2564"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0038"\w*.

\w He|strong="G0114"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5105"\w* that \w despiseth|strong="G0114"\w*, \w despiseth|strong="G0114"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w hath|strong="G1325"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* as \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* brotherly \w love|strong="G5360"\w* ye \w need|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* that I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* taught of \w God|strong="G2312"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* we \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, that ye \w increase|strong="G4052"\w* more and \w more|strong="G3123"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* that ye \w study|strong="G5389"\w* to be \w quiet|strong="G2270"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w do|strong="G4238"\w* your own \w business|strong="G2398"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w work|strong="G2038"\w* \w with|strong="G2398"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* we \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w honestly|strong="G2156"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* ye may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w lack|strong="G5532"\w* of \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to be \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* them which are \w asleep|strong="G2837"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w sorrow|strong="G3076"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w others|strong="G3062"\w* which \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* we \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* rose \w again|strong="G0450"\w*, even \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* which \w sleep|strong="G2837"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w will|strong="G0071"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* we \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* which are \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \add and\add* \w remain|strong="G4035"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w shall|strong="G5348"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w prevent|strong="G5348"\w* them which are \w asleep|strong="G2837"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w descend|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w shout|strong="G2752"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w archangel|strong="G0743"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w trump|strong="G4536"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* shall \w rise|strong="G0450"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*:

\w Then|strong="G1899"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* which are \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \add and\add* \w remain|strong="G4035"\w* shall be caught \w up|strong="G0726"\w* \w together|strong="G0260"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w clouds|strong="G3507"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w meet|strong="G0529"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w air|strong="G0109"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* shall \w we|strong="G2071"\w* \w ever|strong="G3842"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G5125"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*.
